title: Episode 75 w/ DJ Pooh and Lil Duval
itunes:title: Episode 75 w/ DJ Pooh and Lil Duval
description:
N.O.R.E. and DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode the guys drink it up with West Coast legend DJ Pooh and comedian Lil Duval. The guys talk about Pooh's legacy and career which spans working with Dr. Dre, Ice Cube, LL Cool J, the Friday films, Grand Theft auto and a lot more. They also talk about the comedy world and Pooh's and Lil Duval's new film 'Grow House'. --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
